name: Braze
description: Braze provides a customer engagement platform that supports personalized and omnichannel marketing campaigns.

name: Dynamic Yield
description: Dynamic Yield provides a personalization platform that enables businesses to deliver tailored customer experiences.

name: Iterable
description: Iterable offers a cross-channel marketing platform that enables businesses to engage customers with relevant messages.

name: Mapp
description: Mapp provides a customer data platform that helps businesses understand and engage their customers effectively.

name: mParticle
description: mParticle offers a data platform that centralizes customer data from various sources to drive personalized marketing.

name: Ninetailed
description: Ninetailed provides a headless personalization API that allows businesses to deliver individualized customer experiences.

name: Optimove
description: Optimove provides a loyalty and CRM platform that enhances customer retention and engagement through data-driven insights.

name: ReachFive
description: ReachFive provides an identity management platform that enhances user authentication and security.

name: Sheer ID
description: Sheer ID provides an identity marketing platform that verifies customer eligibility for exclusive offers and discounts.

name: StoryStream
description: StoryStream offers a platform for managing and leveraging user-generated content to enhance brand storytelling.

name: Talon.One
description: Talon.One offers a promotion and loyalty management platform that enables businesses to create customized loyalty programs.

name: trbo
description: trbo offers a personalization platform that enhances user engagement and conversion through dynamic content.

name: Voucherify
description: Voucherify offers a promotion engine and API that helps businesses manage and track voucher and coupon campaigns.
